meanings.definition: Record (additional sounds) on an existing recording.
meanings.sent1: He created an overdub of the original track.
meanings.sent2: The overdub added depth to the music.
meanings.sent3: The funny overdub of the movie made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The overdub of nature sounds made the meditation session more relaxing.
meanings.sent5: The overdub of birds chirping brought life to the silent forest.
